Text: You will notice @ 47:55 into this video, a WLVI TV 56 Cambridge/Boston logo will appear for 7 seconds on the bottom of your screen. This movie was recorded from a Boston Massachusetts television station in the U.S.A. Please forgive me for stating American Movie Classics as the original source of this video. I wish the picture quality was better, broadcast television was strictly analog back in the early 1980's and analog video was prone to video noise also called snow.

I have uploaded another copy of this movie it is several minutes longer because it was not edited to allow television commercial time.
This is the new link.
